content: weave in ends pickle x 3 acid and green joined rounds starting with acid color r1 6sc in magic_ring slip_stitch to join 6 r2 ch1 increase x 6 slip_stitch to join 12 r3 ch1 single_crochet increase x 6 slip_stitch to join 18 r4 ch1 2sc increase x 6 slip_stitch to join 24 change color to green in last st r5 ch1 3sc increase x 6 slip_stitch to join 30 fasten_off and weave in ends congratulations you ve just made a burger thank you for trying out my pattern i hope you enjoyed it and i ll love to see your creations
